ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: About loot order
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, but I needed the xp and didn t want to leave Highpass. If I d pissed him off he could ve easily disbanded me. I ve had people disband me from group bc
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, but I needed the xp and didn't want to leave Highpass. If I'd pissed
him off he could've easily disbanded me. I've had people disband me from
group bc they were pissed off that I couldn't heal them in time (like one
time in Crushbone when I kept getting hit by Legos-- the group leader didn't
believe me that I kept getting hit. She claimed that I wasn't even trying to
heal her).
Although onetime we had a group leader who was such a jerk that we all sent
tells to each other and regrouped without him. We had to put him on ignore.
luv,
-Su

> I think what I would have done in that situation would be to loot instead
of
> worrying about healing this jerk. And when he asked for a heal, saying
well
> I have to be quick about getting loot so : P. What else would someone
like
> that deserve?
>
> Lena
>
> >
> > Yeah. Sometimes you group with the only people available though. Like in
> > Highpass if you need in a group you're stuck with the people camping the
> > room you want to camp.
> > I've had mostly good experiences with looting but there are a few people
> > who've given me trouble. One thing that pissed me off-- I was group
leader
> > and had alpha loot established. My computer crashed. When i logged back
in
> > there was a new group leader. Despite the fact that I had been at the
spawn
> > point first and had established the group, he felt that bc he had
reinvited
> > people that he was now in charge. He said it was FFA -- ninja loot.
> > When I asked them to allow me to loot just once corpse he told me I
could if
> > I was fast enough. Often while I was busy healing him he'd go loot
> > something. When it was clear he didn't appreciate my help, I left. I
mean, I
> > need money to buy spells and stuff.
> > luv,
> > -Su
>
>
>
>
